vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Νηρεί (Rec. -ρί), ὁ, indecl. (Heb. נֵרִיָּה),
Neri: Luk.3:27.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.27;
son of: Melchi (G3197H);
father of: Shealtiel (G4528)
§ Neri, "lamp of Yahweh"
Neri, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:27*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼利 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華是我的燈"
所羅巴伯的祖父,麥基的兒子 (路 3:27)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
尼利 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华是我的灯"
所罗巴伯的祖父,麦基的儿子 (路 3:27)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Nê-ri. « ngọn đèn của Đức Chúa Trời ». Xem H5374.
